titleStmt.title: The historie of Orlando Furioso, one of the twelue pieres of France As it was plaid before the Queenes Maiestie.
History of Orlando Furioso
titleStmt.author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.
Ariosto, Lodovico, 1474-1533. Orlando furioso.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Danter for Cuthbert Burbie, and are to be sold at his shop nere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Based on a part of Ariosto's poem.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" with ornaments.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop nere the Royall Exchange
